SHANGHAI SOFTBALL LEAGUE

ABOUT US

As a long standing tradition in Shanghai, the idea is to go out and have some fun in the sun, meet new friends and have a few cold beers. In addition to the games that we play in Shanghai, the league sends teams out to tournaments all across Asia.

We offer a competitive environment with Spring and Fall season being played in the daytime on Saturdays. In the summer, we play Saturday nights, under the lights in a more social level of softball. Out league welcomes all and has players between 17 and 62, male and female.
